sentence.Network_en: The speechmaker raises one hand to start " beating swords into plowshares "
sentence.Network_cn: 演讲人扬起一只手,表示要 “ 弃干戈,结玉帛 ”.

sentence.Network_en: American makers of plowshares could, and as required, make swords as well.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国的犁铧制造商们在必要时也能制造剑.

sentence.Network_en: They will beat their swords into plowshares and their spears into pruning hooks.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们要将刀打成犁头,把枪打成镰刀.
